message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start the negotiations.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 seems fair considering the inflation!
The inflation is working against me, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but 55/45 is the best I can do.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I think I can do a bit better. 57.5/42.5 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The value is literally shrinking for me every round. Meet me in the middle at 52.5/47.5, or this deal is off.
